Class JdbcDriverInfo

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.db.JdbcDriverInfo
public class JdbcDriverInfo extends Object
JDBC driver information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    final String
    className
    The driver's class name.
    final String
    link
    Link to the vendor's driver webpage.
    final String
    name
    The driver name.
    static final String
    OPTION_TYPE
    Identifier String for the option type.
    static final String
    OPTION_TYPE_DOUBLE
    Type identifier String for double options.
    static final String
    OPTION_TYPE_INTEGER
    Type identifier String for integer options.
    static final String
    OPTION_TYPE_PATH
    Type identifier String for file options.
    static final String
    OPTION_TYPE_STRING
    Type identifier String for string options.
    final Collection<Option<?>>
    options
    This driver's options.
    final String
    urlPrefix
    URL prefix used by this driver (used to identify the correct driver to use when accessing a database URL).
    final String
    urlScheme
    The URL scheme for JDBC connections used by this driver.

    • createArgumentsParser

      public ArgumentsParser createArgumentsParser()
      Creates and configures an instance of ArgumentsParser tailored for JDBC Driver arguments. The parser is initialized with a predefined name and no positional arguments, and specific options are added to the parser during its construction.
      Returns:
      a fully configured ArgumentsParser instance for processing JDBC Driver arguments
